articles.title: Samsung confirms Galaxy Ring battery life ahead of launch - 9to5Google
articles.description: Ahead of its launch in the second half of 2024, Samsung has confirmed the battery life estimate of the Galaxy Ring.
articles.content:
The Samsung Galaxy Ring is quickly on its way and new information keeps coming, including an official estimate on battery life.

articles.content:
